data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Hà Nội a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hà Nội, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 152,853 believers find a person of peace today among the 6,914,148 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Hà Nội, Vietnam to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Hà Nội, Vietnam with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Indonesian people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Hà Nội words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Hà Nội, Vietnam to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hà Nội, Vietnam has a population of 7,067,000.

We estimate Hà Nội has 152,853 people who might know Jesus, 566,862 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,347,286 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Over 89.82 percent of the people of Hà Nội are far from Jesus.
